EmailTemplate.name: Revisit Turbonomic (1494337142.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Revisit Turbonomic (1494337142.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Kevin, I wanted to touch base with you in regards to Turbonomic. I know you spoke to my counterpart, Luke, and timing was never ideal. I just wanted to get on the radar and when the timing is right to engage in a conversation I would be the person you contact moving forward. Do you have a timeline in which you would be interested in seeing Turbonomic again? Best,Katie Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
